Services Offered

Pare and Flourish offers a variety of review services. A review for one document/profile of your choice is $50. Additional time following the one-hour review and final review process is $25 per hour. Click here for more information. Be sure to follow us on social media for giveaways!

Resume
We give you the tools you need to wow the recruiter with your resume. Let us help you get that interview!
Cover Letter
We'll teach you how to use your cover letter as a tool. A tool that will take your resume the extra mile!
LinkedIn
More and more recruiters and companies are searching via LinkedIn. We can help you make your profile stand out from the crowd!
  1. Choose your review (resume, cover letter, or LinkedIn).
  2. We review your choice with you.
  3. We talk through your document with you, teaching you the skills you need along the way.
  4. We send you a list of changes to make.
  5. We perform a final review.
  6. You hit the ground running.
